SELECT a.* FROM ( SELECT c.en_name,c.category_id, CAST(SUM(od.yourorder*od.goodsprice)*6.3 AS DECIMAL(18,2)) AS salesAmount, CAST(SUM(od.yourorder*od.goodsprice)*6.3/SUM(od.yourorder) AS DECIMAL(18,2)) AS avgSalesPrice, CAST(sum(ops.buycount*ops.goods_p_price) AS DECIMAL(18,2)) AS buyAmount, SUM(od.yourorder) AS salesCount,SUM(ops.buycount) AS buyCount, CAST((SUM(od.yourorder*od.goodsprice)*6.3-sum(ops.buycount*ops.goods_p_price))/sum(od.yourorder*od.goodsprice)*6.3/100 AS DECIMAL(18,2)) AS profitLoss FROM order_details od INNER JOIN orderinfo oi ON od.orderid=oi.order_no INNER JOIN 1688_category c ON od.goodscatid=c.category_id left JOIN order_product_source ops ON od.orderid=ops.orderid AND od.goodsid=ops.goodsid WHERE od.state<2 AND oi.state>0 AND oi.state<6 AND c.category_id<>0
and left(oi.create_time,7)=#{time}
GROUP BY od.goodscatid ) a ORDER BY
a.salesCount
a.salesAmount
a.profitLoss
DESC limit ${page},20;
